statement.p: What is the area of the triangle above?

solution.p: Because we have side lengths but not angles or a height, we will use Heron's Formula.
The semi-perimeter is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{2}}{\left({6.66}+{1.67}+{6.60}\right)}={7.465} which has 3 significant digits.
Each factor has at least 2 significant digits so the product does as well.
